mapper.delete: DELETE FROM OFU WHERE orderid = #{OrderId} and foodid = #{FoodId} and foodnumber = #{FoodNumber}
mapper.select: SELECT foodname,foodnumber FROM (SELECT foodname,foodnumber,orderid FROM food,ofu WHERE food.foodid=ofu.foodid) AS A WHERE orderid=#{OrderId}
SELECT foodname,SUM(foodnumber)/(SELECT SUM(foodnumber) FROM ofu)*100 AS Percent FROM (SELECT foodname,foodnumber,orderid FROM tmxk.food,tmxk.ofu WHERE food.foodid=ofu.foodid) AS A GROUP BY foodname
